front.title: Party MIB for Version 2 of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMPv2)

abstract.t: The Administrative Infrastructure for SNMPv2 document [3] defines the properties associated with SNMPv2 parties, SNMPv2 contexts, and access control policies. It is the purpose of this document, the Party MIB for SNMPv2, to define managed objects which correspond to these properties.
